Wikimedia Foundation | Site Reliability Engineers | San Francisco, CA or REMOTE | Full time | https://grnh.se/jolom8at1

We are looking for Site Reliability Engineers! Would you like to join the team responsible for the reliability and performance of a global top-10 website, Wikipedia? We are growing the team and have several different roles at various levels available.

We're searching for people with a drive to explore, experiment, and learn new technologies. Do you enjoy eliminating boring things from your daily workflow by automating them? Are you comfortable working in a highly collaborative, consensus-oriented, open environment and as part of a globally-distributed team? Then you might be just the person we need.

For details, requirements or example projects, please see the Job Description: https://grnh.se/jolom8at1

More information about Wikimedia, including other positions available, can be found on: https://wikimediafoundation.org/wiki/Work_with_us
